item.description:
Come on out and play some disc golf and take a nice walk along the paths thru the woods. Disc golf is a sport where you toss frisbee like discs along a path into a metal basket. You don't have to be good at tossing..just come out and have fun and get some fresh air. We always have a good time. There are 18 holes and we'll be out for a few hours. There is no charge to play here and you can pick up loaner discs at the store across from the park. We will also meet there to make things easier.

So please join me... remember to wear sneakers or good trail walking shoes and of course some water.

If you have questions call me at 315-0275
Cindy


Here are directions to the park..

Location Details
03076 Zip/Postal Code: Map Zip

Local Directions: 93N; exit 3 (Rte 111). Take Rte. 111 west 4 miles to a left on Rte. 128 south 3 miles to the park on left. 1st tee is behind baseball field. Trail into woods for other holes.

304 Mammoth Road
Pelham, NH 03076
item.how_to_find_us: lets meet at the store across from the park to pick up discs
item.name: Disc Golf and nature walk
